injectables.name: AuthApiEffects

properties.name: login
properties.defaultValue:
this.actions$.pipe(
    ofType(LoginPageActions.login),
    exhaustMap(({credentials}: LoginAction) => this.authService.login(credentials).pipe(
      map((user: User) => AuthApiActions.loginSuccess({user})),
      catchError(() => of(AuthApiActions.loginFailure()))
    )),
  )

properties.name: logout
properties.defaultValue:
this.actions$.pipe(
    ofType(ErrorInterceptorActions.logout, NavActions.logout),
    exhaustMap(() => this.authService.logout().pipe(
      map(() => AuthApiActions.logoutSuccess()),
      catchError(() => of(AuthApiActions.loginFailure()))
    )),
  )

properties.name: getI18n
properties.defaultValue:
this.actions$.pipe(
    ofType(AppInitializationActions.setLanguage),
    exhaustMap(({language}: LoadI18nAction) => this.i18nService.getI18n(language).pipe(
      map((i18n: I18n) => I18nApiActions.getI18nSuccess({i18n})),
      catchError(() => of(I18nApiActions.getI18nFailure()))
    ))
  )

ShoppingListApiEffects

properties.name: addShoppingListItem$
chooseCurrentShoppingList$
getShoppingListItems$
getShoppingLists$
properties.defaultValue:
this.actions$.pipe(
    ofType(ShoppingListContainerActions.loadShoppingLists),
    withLatestFrom(this.store.select(selectUserID)),
    filter(([_, userId]) => !!userId),
    exhaustMap(([_, userId]) => this.shoppingListService.getShoppingLists(userId!).pipe(
      map((shoppingLists: ShoppingList[]) => ShoppingListApiActions.loadShoppingListsSuccess({shoppingLists})),
      catchError(() => of(ShoppingListApiActions.loadShoppingListsFailure()))
    )),
  )

components.name: AppComponent
BetaTeaserComponent
components.templateData: 👶 {{'beta.teaser' | translate: (translations$ | async): (currentLang$ | async) || 'de' }} here.

components.name: ButtonComponent
components.templateData:
<button
  class="button"
  [disabled]="isDisabled"
  [attr.data-test]="e2eTestName"
  [type]="buttonType"
  (click)="onClick($event)"
  [ngClass]="{
  'button--no-left-border-radius': isInputGroup,
  'button--color-inverted': color === 'inverted' && !isDisabled,
  'button--color-accent': color === 'accent' && !isDisabled,
  'button--color-warning': color === 'warn' && !isDisabled,
  'button--color-disabled': isDisabled,
  'button--warning-border': isInputGroup && hasErrors
  }"
>
  <fa-icon *ngIf="iconLeft"
           [icon]="['fas', iconLeft]"
           class="icon-left"
  ></fa-icon>
  {{buttonText}}
  <fa-icon *ngIf="iconRight"
           [icon]="['fas', iconRight]"
           class="icon-right"
  ></fa-icon>
</button>

components.name: CookbookContainerComponent
components.templateData:
<app-recipe-list
  [translations]="translations$ | async"
  [currentLang]="currentLang$ | async"
  [recipes]="recipes$ | async"
  (deleteRecipe)="onDeleteRecipe($event)"
  (editRecipe)="onEditRecipe($event)"
  (clickRecipe)="onClickRecipe($event)"
  (inputChanged)="onInputChanged($event)"
></app-recipe-list>
<app-button
[buttonText]="'button.submit' | translate: (translations$ | async) : (currentLang$ | async)"
(click)="onCreate()"
>
</app-button>

<app-shopping-list-page
  [shoppingLists]="shoppingLists$ | async"
  [activeShoppingListId]="activeShoppingListId$ | async"
  [shoppingListItems]="shoppingListsItems$ | async | unToggled"
  [translations]="translations$ | async"
  [activeShoppingList]="activeShoppingList$ | async"
  [currentLanguage]="currentLanguage$ | async"
  (changeShoppingList)="onShoppingListChange($event)"
  (addShoppingListItem)="onShoppingListItemAdded($event)"
  (deleteShoppingListItem)="onShoppingListItemDeleted($event)"
  (moveShoppingListItem)="onShoppingListItemMoved($event)">
</app-shopping-list-page>

variables.name: shoppingListAdapter
shoppingListReducers
StringUnion
variables.defaultValue:
<UnionType extends string>(...values: UnionType[]) => {
  Object.freeze(values);
  const valueSet: Set<string> = new Set(values);

  const guard = (value: string): value is UnionType => {
    return valueSet.has(value);
  };

  const check = (value: string): UnionType => {
    if (!guard(value)) {
      const actual = JSON.stringify(value);
      const expected = values.map(s => JSON.stringify(s)).join(' | ');
      throw new TypeError(`Value '${actual}' is not assignable to type '${expected}'.`);
    }
    return value;
  };

  const unionNamespace = {guard, check, values};
  return Object.freeze(unionNamespace as typeof unionNamespace & { type: UnionType });
}

src/app/shared/model/model.ts.name: StringUnion
src/app/shared/model/model.ts.defaultValue:
<UnionType extends string>(...values: UnionType[]) => {
  Object.freeze(values);
  const valueSet: Set<string> = new Set(values);

  const guard = (value: string): value is UnionType => {
    return valueSet.has(value);
  };

  const check = (value: string): UnionType => {
    if (!guard(value)) {
      const actual = JSON.stringify(value);
      const expected = values.map(s => JSON.stringify(s)).join(' | ');
      throw new TypeError(`Value '${actual}' is not assignable to type '${expected}'.`);
    }
    return value;
  };

  const unionNamespace = {guard, check, values};
  return Object.freeze(unionNamespace as typeof unionNamespace & { type: UnionType });
}
